physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#970 Bloomfield Park, 1920.'' On back of photograph: ''Bloomfield Park, Sam Bloomfield (not Jewish) Fish Market supplying the west side Orthodox Community with fish for Sabbath, #970.''

mods.abstract: Newspaper pictorial section from the Rocky Mountain News, Denver, CO, Sunday, July 11, 1920. Collage of pictures showing people at the Sam Bloomfield Fish Market, which catered to east European Jewish immigrants on Denver's West Side.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
